title: Magnus Rakeng
content:
Born: 1967 in LIllehammer, Norway  
still alive.

Designer of [Pilot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131200930/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Pilot/mudTyper+Weights/) (1995), Envy (currently [exclusive to Revolution Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131200930/http:/www.melkeveien.no/portfolio/index.php?pid=112&cat=typografi&offset=15&sstrn=&scat=15)), [Radio](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131200930/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Radio/mudTyper+Weights/) (1998), [SuperDuper](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131200930/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/SuperDuper/mudTyper+Weights/) (1999), Telenor ( [corporate face](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131200930/http:/www.melkeveien.no/portfolio/index.php?pid=135&cat=typografi&offset=0&sstrn=&scat=15) for Telenor phone company), [Schytte Berg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131200930/http:/www.melkeveien.no/portfolio/index.php?pid=146&cat=typografi&offset=0&sstrn=&scat=15) a Jugend font based on the architecture and of the norwegian Jugend architect H. Schytte Berg. In 2001 Magnus designed the logo for [Eye Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131200930/http:/www.melkeveien.no/portfolio/index.php?pid=150&cat=typografi&offset=0&sstrn=&scat=15). Magnus' fonts are distributed by [Thirstype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131200930/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/) through [Village](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131200930/http:/www.vllg.com/).

Magnus Rakeng's [home page](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131200930/http:/www.melkeveien.no/portfolio/index.php?pid=450&cat=typografi&offset=0&sstrn=&scat=15).
author: magnus_rakeng
